channel.title: Nigth Witches: 1945: Over German Soil
channel.description:
"There was a night bomber regiment in World War Two composed entirely of women. Natural-born Soviet airwomen.These 200 women and girls, flying outdated biplanes from open fields near the front lines, attacked the invading German forces every night for 1,100 consecutive nights. When they ran out of bombs they dropped railroad ties."
This is the eighth monthly series in a run of Jason Morningstar's ***Night Witches*** that will span a number of months and eventually encompass the entire Great Patriotic War. The Regiment flies from CHWASZCZYNO/BUCHHOLZ, the final duty station before victory in the Great Patriotic War. This will be the final month of our campaign, before a special wrap-up and reflect episode framed as a Hisotry Channel documentary next month.
This series is comprised of 4 sessions. You must volunteer for each individually. It's best if you can volunteer for all of them, but not required. If you played in any previous series, you may carry over your pilot or create a new one.
CONTENT WARNING: This is a game about war, and explicitly a game about the price women pay to wage it. Violence and death, including the death of player characters, are an inescapable aspect of this game. We will use the X-Card and Script Change to assure as safe a play space as possible, as well as Open Door Policy. Sessions will be recorded for reference, but only released for public consumption if all players consent.
[date=2020-02-04 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvE2kTVJum4gMjBgZKb) [date=2020-02-11 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvE3-QY5Vj5cSazsTkU) [date=2020-02-18 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: [Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvE3gjgrMjfBv9AuHIF) [date=2020-02-25 time=20:00:00 timezone="America/New_York"]: [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-LvE3nbFefxR1zPr6eX-)

item.title: Nigth Witches: 1945: Over German Soil
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

Night Witches February 2020 #2 of 4: Bucholz

Death on the ground, sudden and unexpected, and death in the air, inevitably, for the Natural Born Soviet Airwomen of the 588th Night Bomber Regiment.

Starring Bethany, Eli, Alexi, Maria, and Puckett, with @JimLikesGames as MC.

Read full topic

item.title: Nigth Witches: 1945: Over German Soil
item.dc:creator: @JimLikesGames
item.description:
@JimLikesGames wrote:

Night Witches February 2020 #1 of 4: CHWASZCZYNO

The war rages to a bloody climax as the Natural Born Soviet Airwomen of the 588th Night Bomber Regiment struggle with internal strife keeping them awake during the day. Soon they’ll be over Berlin.

Starring Bethany, Eli, Puckett, Maria, and Alexi, with @JimLikesGames as MC.

Read full topic
